Description: Steatite amulet: in the form of two fingers with incised detail.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: J.H. Taylor and N.C. Strudwick, Mummies: Death and the Afterlife in Ancient Egypt. Treasures from The British Museum, Santa Ana and London 2005, pp. 100-1, pl. on p. 101.
Bibliographic references: Taylor & Strudwick 2005 / Mummies: Death and the Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (p.100-101)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: The British Museum/National Geographic: Treasures of the Earth. 2005-2008, California, The Bowers Museum, Death and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt 2011 11 June- Present, 3 year renewable, Indianapolis,The Children’s Museum of Indianapolis, Treasures of the Earth
